name: Sample Evil App
description:
This app tries to steal your credentials and reports whether it was or wasn't able to do so. The itch.io sandbox should prevent it from doing so.

Also, when given an API key, it tries to retrieve your profile and show your display name and avatar (that part isn't evil).

The source code for this app is available at https://github.com/fasterthanlime/sample-evil-app

Bonus content: here's a sample evil link!
